author: IGN
description:
Running from August 16 to August 29, 2025, Dress to Impress’ Lady Gaga’s Mayhem Update introduces in-game items, outfits, accessories, and more, all inspired by the pop star. There’s a special round that appears every two hours, and Lady Gaga is featured as a guest judge in the Style Showdown mode as an NPC, with special voice lines recorded by the pop star herself.

0:00 - Intro
0:10 - Dressing Room Walkthrough
1:05 - Dress to Impress Lady Gaga Outfits
2:05 - Dress to Impress Lady Gaga Makeup
3:14 - Garden of Eden Special Round
12:46 - Lady Gaga Style Showdown

For more Dress to Impress tips, check out our Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/dress-to-impress
title: Dress to Impress Lady Gaga’s Mayhem Update Gameplay

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Gamescom Trailer for Vampires: Bloodlord Rising, an action RPG vampire simulation game developed by Mehuman Games. Players will become a full-fledged vampire to establish a castle, manage a clan, and rule the lands alone or with friends in co-op. Vampires: Bloodlord Rising is launching on October 23 for PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).
title: Vampires: Bloodlord Rising - Official Trailer | gamescom 2025

description:

If you are in Cologne, Germany at gamescom 2025, check them out in Hall 6 to experience hands-on demos and have a chance at winning limited edition products from Level Infinite, and giveaways from Alienware.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025

Challenge the rulers of the 9 levels of hell in Inferius, coming soon to PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Release Date Trailer for Arctic Awakening, a first-person narrative-driven thriller developed by GoldFire Studios. Players will awaken in the Arctic after a plane crash that sets players off into the wilderness with a court-mandated therapy bot. Uncover the mysteries of the ice across this vibrant experience, taking players on a journey across multiple biomes. Arctic Awakening is launching on September 18 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#ArcticAwakening #Gaming #IGN
title: Arctic Awakening - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the release date trailer for Honeycomb: The World Beyond, a survival adventure on a brand-new world, Sota7. Players will search for the cure for Earth by discovering and creating new plant and animal species, all while exploring, building, and trying to survive in this beautiful and mysterious new world. Honeycomb: The World Beyond will be available on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series S/X on November 6, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Klyntar: Throne of Knull Map Reveal Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the hit free-to-play action team shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players can get a look at the new map coming to the game that brings players to the Throne of Knull, filled with symbiote designs and dark halls to claim victory. The Klyntar: Throne of Knull Map is launching on August 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#MarvelRivals #Klyntar #Gaming
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Klyntar: Throne of Knull Map Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the creepy trailer for GOOD BOY, an upcoming horror thriller movie starring Indy the Dog, Shane Jensen, Arielle Friedman, and Larry Fessenden.

Our canine hero, Indy, finds himself on a new adventure with his human owner—and best friend—Todd, leaving city life for a long-vacant family home in the country. From the start, two things are abundantly clear: Indy is wary of the creepy old house, and his affection for Todd is unwavering. After moving in, Indy is immediately vexed by empty corners, tracks an invisible presence only he can see, perceives phantasmagoric warnings from a long-dead dog, and is haunted by visions of the previous occupant’s grim death. When Todd begins succumbing to the dark forces swirling around the house, Indy must battle a malevolence intent on dragging his beloved Todd into the afterlife.

Good Boy is produced by Ben Leonberg and Kari Fischer. It is written by Alex Cannon and Ben Leonberg.

Good Boy, directed by Ben Leonberg, opens in North American
title: Good Boy - Official Trailer (2025) Shane Jensen, Arielle Friedman, Larry Fessenden

author: IGN
description:
Check out the first 30 minutes of Cave Crave, the most realistic VR spelunking adventure! Step into the underground and explore vast cave systems where the environment itself is your map. Overcome steep climbs, crawl through narrow tunnels, and clear obstacles with your hammer as you navigate the mysterious depths. This is spelunking like you’ve never seen it before in VR!

Captured on Meta Quest 3.
#CaveCrave #VR
title: Cave Crave – First 30 Minutes of VR Spelunking

author: IGN
description:
This ain’t no walk in the park. Watch the full Primitive War trailer now.

'PRIMITIVE WAR' coming to theatres across the USA and Australia AUGUST 21 2025 proudly presented by Fathom Entertainment and Rialto Distribution. Followed by release worldwide.

From director Luke Sparke comes PRIMITIVE WAR based on the popular novel 'The Primitive War' by Ethan Pettus.
Vietnam. 1968. A recon unit known as Vulture Squad is sent to an isolated jungle valley to uncover the fate of a missing Green Beret platoon. They soon discover they are not alone.
Sparke Films in association with Let it be Entertainment and producers Carly Sparke, Carmel Imrie, Luke Sparke, Geoff Imrie and Alex Becconsall presents PRIMITIVE WAR. An action-packed war film that pits battle hardened soldiers against the greatest predators that ever walked the earth.

USA tickets here:  https://hubs.la/Q03ynb130

Presented by Primitive War

#IGN
title: Primitive War - Official Trailer | In Theaters August 21

author: IGN
description:
From New Line Cinema comes the ninth entry in the theatrical Conjuring universe, The Conjuring: Last Rites, directed by franchise veteran Michael Chaves and produced by franchise architects James Wan and Peter Safran

The Conjuring: Last Rites delivers another thrilling chapter of the iconic Conjuring cinematic universe, based on real events. Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson reunite for one last case as renowned, real-life paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren in a powerful and spine-chilling addition to the global box office-breaking franchise.

Farmiga and Wilson star alongside Mia Tomlinson and Ben Hardy, who portray Ed and Lorraine’s daughter Judy Warren and her boyfriend, Tony Spera, as well as Steve Coulter returning as Father Gordon, Rebecca Calder, Elliot Cowan, Kíla Lord Cassidy, Beau Gadsdon, John Brotherton and Shannon Kook.

Chaves directs from a screenplay by Ian Goldberg & Richard Naing and David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick, story by David Leslie Johnson-McGoldric
title: The Conjuring: Last Rites Exclusive Clip (2025) Patrick Wilson, Elliot Cowan

author: IGN
description:
Mega Charizard X is returning to the Pokémon TCG—this time as a powerful Mega Evolution Pokémon ex. Watch the latest Pokémon TCG trailer for a peek at the Flame Pokémon in battle, along with a peek at Mega attack rare Mega Charizard X ex*, Mega Gardevoir ex*, and Mega Lucario ex*. The trailer also teases the new Mega Evolution Pokémon ex coming to the Pokémon TCG in 2026, including a reveal of the Mega Dragonite ex*.

*Note: The cards shown in the footage are under development.

#PokemonTCG #Gaming #IGN
title: Pokemon TCG - Official New Mega Evolution Pokemon ex Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Metal Gear Solid Delta Snake Eater gives the PlayStation 2 classic MGS3 a fresh coat of Unreal Engine 5 paint, tweaking some of the gameplay to give it a modern feel, but keeping things pretty much how we remember them. 

But once that’s out of the way, what should Konami remake next? Let’s weigh the pros and cons of remaking and releasing some of the obvious classics like the original PS1 Metal Gear Solid (which already got a Game Cube remake with Twin Snakes) or the PSP fan-favorite multiplayer Peace Walker, which got an overhaul already for the PS3 and Xbox 360 on the HD Collection. 

Then there are some that might be a little more complicated to remake and market, whether it’s the ancient MSX games that started the series, Metal Gear 1 and Metal Gear 2: Solid Snake, or the PSP tactical card game RPG Metal Gear Acid, or Snake’s Revenge, the weird unofficial/un-Kojima NES spinoff Snake’s Revenge. 

Metal Gear Solid Delta hits Xbox Series X, PlayStation 5 and PC on August 28th, 2025,
title: 7 Metal Gear Remakes We Need After MGS3 Delta

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Battlefield 2042 trailer to see what you can expect with the Road to Battlefield 6 event, which brings a free pass celebrating the legacy of Battlefield, new hardware, a reimagining of the Iwo Jima map, and more. Battlefield 2042's Road to Battlefield 6 event is available today (August 18) through October 7, 2025.

The Road to Battlefield 6 event for Battlefield 2042 will feature exclusive cross-rewards, with over 20 exclusive rewards for Battlefield 6, available at the game launch. Players will be able to unlock these rewards by playing Battlefield 2042 and progressing through the Free Pass.

#Battlefield2042 #Battlefield6 #Gaming
title: Battlefield 2042 - Official Road to Battlefield 6: Iwo Jima Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Pokémon TCG Pocket trailer to see the announcement that Mega Altaria, Mega Gyarados, and Mega Blaziken are coming to the trading card game and will debut this fall 2025 in Pokémon TCG Pocket as powerful Mega Evolution Pokémon ex.

#PokemonTCGPocket #Gaming #IGN
title: Pokemon TCG Pocket - Official Mega Evolution Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Z-A Battle Club is ready for its newest Link Battle entrants. Watch the latest Pokémon Legends: Z-A trailer to get a closer look at the Z-A Battle Club and get a breakdown of how Link Battles work. Up to four players can take part in battles where they attempt to defeat as many of each other’s Pokémon as they can within the time limit. You can make full use of a variety of moves and Mega Evolutions and go on the offensive. Pokemon Legends: Z-A will be available on Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 on October 16, 2025.

#PokemonLegendsZA #Gaming #IGN
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - Official 'Enjoy Pokemon Battles Like Never Before' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Turn the pages or die. Take another look at Comix Zero in this brutal exclusive trailer for the upcoming game, which is a tribute to Sega classics. Comix Zero features a mix of genres, including beat ‘em up, Metroidvania, platformer, and roguelike, presented with comic book visuals. Comix Zero will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam. You can learn more about Comix Zero here if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3149550/Comix_Zero/

#ign #gaming #ComixZero
title: Comix Zero -  Official Demo Release Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Arena Power Trailer for Lost Soul Aside, an upcoming third-person action-adventure game developed by Ultizero Games. Players can learn to master the abilities of Arena to boost combat effectiveness along the journey. Make use of Arena's Crystal Blast, Mountain Break, and more to turn the tide of any fight. Lost Soul Aside is launching on August 29 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#LostSoulAside #Gaming #IGN
title: Lost Soul Aside - Official Arena Power Trailer

author: IGN
description:
StarRupture gets an early access release date announcement. Check out the latest StarRupture trailer for the sci-fi open-world base-building survival game for another look at action-packed gameplay. StarRupture launches into PC early access on January 6, 2026.

In StarRupture, you are a prisoner serving your sentence on a faraway planet where danger lurks at every turn. Tasked with building a factory and gathering resources for global corporations that don’t care if you live or die, survival on Arcadia-7 is anything but guaranteed. Not only will you have to defend your base from menacing enemies, but you’ll also have to prepare for a somewhat more terrifying threat; the planet’s very own life-giving—and taking—star, Ruptura.

#ign #StarRupture
title: StarRupture - Official PC Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy this new cutscene from Billie Bust Up, the upcoming 3D platforming musical game inspired by your favorite timeless, magical animated films. This cutscene features Scrimshaw telling the story of the Pirate Queen, described by developer Giddy Goat Games as "a clever and theatrical rogue with a hidden cave full of secrets, songs, and shiny loot." In Billie Bust Up, meet a fantastical cast of characters, take gameplay cues from the music—and try not to let the villains’ songs get stuck in your head. Bille Bust Up will be available on PC. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1400830/Billie_Bust_Up/

#ign #gaming #BillieBustUp
title: Billie Bust Up: Official Pirate Queen Cutscene

author: IGN
description:
Get your first look at Gallipoli, the next game in the long-running realistic multiplayer WW1 game series that includes Verdun, Tannenberg, and Isonzo. WW1: Gallipoli takes place in the Middle Eastern Front theater of World War I, and you'll play as either Ottoman forces or the British Empire. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3065940/Gallipoli/

title: WW1: Gallipoli – Official Reveal Trailer
